ModMetaData.name: Refactored Work Priorities (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Dingo
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img] Update of Dingos mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1230074511
[img]https://i.imgur.com/pufA0kM.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/RefactoredWorkPriorities][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/WjDSfUn.png[/img][/td] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/h5VwTNL.png[/img][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img]
[h1][url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=774989162]Original mod by Dingo[/url] [url=https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=26077.msg384802#msg384802]Ludeon[/url]
Unofficial update for B18[/h1] ________________________________________________________________________________
[b][url=https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=26077.0]Forums thread with source code and direct downloads[/url][/b]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/784MtpI.png[/img]
Grants you additional control over colonists, including some tweaks to their work priorities and schedules.
The mod includes an options menu (Options Mod Settings).
[list] [*][b]Injured animals[/b] will be fed by handlers instead of doctors. [*][b]Removing roofs[/b] prioritised above building roofs. [*][b]Custom repair threshold[/b] - you decide when repairs should be made. [*][b]Repair designator[/b] - force repairs on buildings above the repair threshold. [*][b]Prioritise rottables[/b] - haul corn, meals etc. as a high priority. [*][b]Prioritise deterioratables[/b] - haul items as a high priority. [*][b]Set an item HP threshold[/b] to avoid prioritising items with low HP. [/list]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/5x6icWm.png[/img] [h1] [list] [*][url=https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?action=profile;u=36313][b]Marnador[/b][/url] - [url=https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=11022.0]RimWorld Font[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/merthsoft][b]Merthykins[/b][/url] - Code [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/UnlimitedHugs][b]UnlimitedHugs[/b][/url] - Code [*][url=https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?action=profile;u=62564][b]Zhentar[/b][/url] - Code [*][url=http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198071157776][b]vEd_[/b][/url] - Simplified Chinese translation [*][url=https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?action=profile;u=2507][b]mrofa[/b][/url] - Art [*][url=http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198041977139][b]Qarisma[/b][/url] - Tweak suggestion [/list] [/h1]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/PwoNOj4.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
